title: Chiostri e cortili
creator_credit: Ubaldo Magnachi and Istuto Nazionale Luce
brief_description: An exploration of the architectural beauty and historical associations of cloisters and courtyards in and around Rome. Includes views of San Giovanni in Lateran, Santa Maria del Angeli and some of the work of Michelangelo. Commentary is in Italian.
description: An exploration of the architectural beauty and historical associations of cloisters and courtyards in and around Rome. Includes views of San Giovanni in Lateran, Santa Maria del Angeli and some of the work of Michelangelo. Commentary is in Italian.
